message_1: A number "3" represents a Caesar cipher encryption key in which each letter in the original message is shifted 3 alphabets to the right. Decrypt the message "EB GUBFR JBEYQ VF ABG PBAARPGRQ" using Caesar cipher.
message_2:
To decrypt the message, we need to shift each letter 3 positions to the left in the alphabet.

The decrypted message is: "BY DOING WORLD IS NOT ORGANIZED"
